attributes.action: Better Condition fo Unpaid Family Carers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Dear Mr Brown
               Why should unpaid family carers such as myself and thousands more have to rely on income support and live a life of uncertainty, after giving up employment to care for our loved ones,

We dont have savings or property  or any sort of life,
Iam sure your new government can pave the way for a fair deal for such carers, as carers dont want hand outs just recognition for the unpaid work we do day after day, saving the government Millions of pounds for our controbution to society,

So come on Mr Brown, give carers a life and a bit of dignity and let we carers pay our way in society,
Consider a minimum wage for such carers and a secondary pension for our life long contribution to society, thank you.

from a long Suffering Unpaid Carer
